hero.title: Beautiful
hero.description: Our clinic specializes in the latest dental techniques in Cairo. From immediate implants to professional whitening, we guarantee you a healthy and beautiful smile at competitive prices.
hero.imageAlt: Smiling female doctor providing medical service

treatments.title: Our Specialized Services
treatments.implantsDesc: Advanced dental implants with 3D technology with 10 years warranty. Immediate installation on the same day.
treatments.whiteningDesc: Laser whitening, instant and 100% safe results. Includes sensitivity protector.
treatments.orthoDesc: Invisalign - Invisible, comfortable, and fast. 12-18 months for final results.
treatments.fillingsDesc: Cosmetic fillings safe without mercury. 100% natural color lasts 7-10 years.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Comprehensive answers to your questions about our services
faq.a1: Not at all! We use strong local anesthesia and modern techniques. You may feel pressure but no pain. After surgery, you may feel slight discomfort for 2-3 days that can be managed with pain relief medication.
faq.q2: How long does the implant procedure take?
faq.a2: The procedure takes 30-60 minutes depending on the number of teeth. After that, you need 3-6 months for the implant to fully integrate with the bone before placing the crown.
faq.q3: Is there a warranty on implants?
faq.a3: Yes! All implants are covered by a 10-year warranty. If your body rejects the implant (very rare), we take a new x-ray and try again at no extra cost.
faq.a4: Yes, professional whitening is 100% safe when done correctly. We use approved gel at safe concentration + gum protection. Results last 6-12 months.
faq.q5: When will I see alignment results?
faq.a5: Clear aligners (Invisalign) work faster than traditional braces. You'll see noticeable results after 3-4 months. Total treatment usually takes 12-18 months depending on your case.

testimonials.title: Our Patients' Reviews
testimonials.subtitle: Thousands of Egyptian smiles that changed their lives
testimonials.testimonial1Text: Truly an amazing experience! The doctor is very professional and the clinic is clean and modern. The results of dental implants are better than what I expected. I'll recommend them to all my friends.
testimonials.testimonial2Text: I did teeth whitening and was afraid of pain, but the medical team was very kind and there was no pain at all. My teeth are now white and beautiful! Thank God.
testimonials.testimonial3Text: I started with clear teeth aligners and truly nobody noticed! The doctor follows up with me every month and the results are very clear. I recommend it to everyone with teeth problems.
testimonials.testimonial4Text: I had an old filling and the doctor told me about smart fillings. The difference between the old and new filling is huge! And it lasts longer too.
testimonials.testimonial5Text: I was afraid of tooth extraction but the doctor used advanced techniques that made the procedure very easy. No pain or complications and I went back to work the same day!

products.title: Featured Products
products.subtitle: Original and reliable products for your teeth health at home
products.toothpasteDesc: Egyptian toothpaste from the best international brands. Contains fluoride and calcium for complete protection.
products.mouthwashDesc: Mouthwash with natural ingredients. Kills bacteria and maintains healthy gums.
products.toothbrushDesc: Electric toothbrush with modern sonic technology. Cleans your teeth more deeply.
products.flossDesc: Natural silk dental floss. Cleans between teeth with high precision.
products.whiteningDesc: Clinically approved whitening gel. You can use it at home safely.
products.vitaminDesc: Natural vitamins that strengthen teeth from within. Calcium and vitamin D.
products.tipText: Using these products regularly maintains your teeth for many years and prevents cavities and diseases. Choose from our collection that thousands of Egyptian families have tested and trust. Remember: Prevention is better than cure! ðŸ¦·âœ¨
